Headline: Hong Kong police arrest girl, 13, over space oil possession after viral video
Abstract:
... girl seated on a light rail train, appearing to smoke an e-cigarette. When the train stopped at Tin Shui station, she staggered out of the carriage and held onto the railings on the station's platform for balance. 

 Police said they received a report at around 7.15pm on Thursday and apprehended the minor at Tin Shui Shopping Centre, where they found a vape and a suspected space oil pod on her. She was arrested on suspicion of possessing dangerous drugs. 

 Last month, Hong Kong banned space oil – often inhaled through an e-cigarette – by adding its main component , an anaesthetic called etomidate, to the Dangerous Drug Ordinance. 

 Social workers say space oil has risen in popularity...

 Last month, Hong Kong banned space oil – often inhaled through an e-cigarette – by adding its main component , an anaesthetic called etomidate, to the Dangerous Drug Ordinance. 

 Social workers say space oil has risen in popularity...

Headline: 空白指南
Abstract:
...電子煙,狠狠吸了一口。

去外面走一圈吧。

什麼?

走一圈。他重複了一遍。你只好沿着街道走了一圈,這幾天是旅遊旺季,街道上的人群摩肩接踵,走一圈都得花費不少的力氣。你聽着人們肆無忌憚的歡聲笑語,一度被他們的氛圍所感染。將晚未晚時,你走回...

Headline: 為什麼現在的生意越來越難做了?
Abstract: ...電子煙這玩意還不算什麼高科技只是影響到它們的分成了現在怎麼樣了呢?衆所周知這裡的高淨值產業基本處於全壟斷以至於有體制內外這一套說法,所以有時候別怪那些資本家除了與民爭利它們的選擇面其實很小花了大錢去搞科研到頭來大概率還是會因為觸碰到它們的利...

Headline: 北城國際機場的穹頂在正午陽光下泛着冷金屬光澤,喬洛拖着銀灰色行李箱穿過玻璃幕牆時,被撲面而來的幹燥空氣嗆得咳嗽起來。候機樓外栽種的胡楊樹葉片沙沙作響,他低頭看了眼手腕上的歐米茄超霸,這是十八歲生日時喬

Headline: Youth in peril for alcohol, tobacco, and vaping
Abstract:
... Filipino youth, driven by the proliferation of e-cigarettes, vapes, and heated tobacco products. According to the latest Global Youth Tobacco Survey, approximately one out of every seven Filipino teenagers aged 13 to 15 is now using vapes. This represents a staggering increase from 37,513 young vape users in 2021 to 423,185 in 2023. These numbers are not just statistics—they represent a generation at risk of lifelong addiction and preventable diseases. 

 The tobacco and nicotine industry has been relentless in its efforts to target young people through aggressive marketing, flavored products, and misleading claims about harm reduction. Their tactics are designed to...
Content:
... Filipino youth, driven by the proliferation of e-cigarettes, vapes, and heated tobacco products. According to the latest Global Youth Tobacco Survey, approximately one out of every seven Filipino teenagers aged 13 to 15 is now using vapes. This represents a staggering increase from 37,513 young vape users in 2021 to 423,185 in 2023. These numbers are not just statistics—they represent a generation at risk of lifelong addiction and preventable diseases. 

 The tobacco and nicotine industry has been relentless in its efforts to target young people through aggressive marketing, flavored products, and misleading claims about harm reduction. Their tactics are designed to...

Headline: [POPULER OTOMOTIF] Adegan Sinetron Tak Relevan, Ketika Saldo Kartu Tol Habis | Video Chery J6 Ditabrak dari Belakang | Alasan kenapa Harga Yamaha F1ZR Bekas Kian Mahal
Abstract:
... Yamaha F1ZR Bekas Kian Mahal

KOMPAS.com/DIO DANANJAYA Yamaha F1ZR Marlboro Edition di IIMS 2022

Ada fenomena unik pada sepeda motor bermesin 2 tak yang pernah merajai jalanan Indonesia pada tahun 90-an hingga awal 2000-an. Seiring berjalannya waktu, harga motor bekas 2 tak, khususnya Yamaha F1ZR justru semakin mahal, meskipun usia motor ini sudah cukup tua. Padahal motor bebek atau sport kini sudah tak jadi pilihan utama konsumen, di tengah gempuran motor matik keluaran baru.

Headline: 泰國嚴打電子煙  一周拘690人 (01:06)
Abstract:
...電子煙銷售行動，共拘捕690人。

電子煙在泰國是非法的。出於對青少年健康問題的擔憂，泰國警方加大對電子煙的打擊力度。自2月26日至3月4日，泰國警方開展了為期一周的嚴厲打擊電子煙設備和電子煙液銷售的行動，破獲了666宗案件，拘捕690名疑...
